CWEs: CWE-601: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
CWE-749: Exposed Dangerous Method or Function
description: The function is vulnerable to Open Redirect attacks as it uses the getJSON method to load data from an external site. This could be manipulated to redirect users to a malicious site. It is also vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) as it submits forms without any CSRF tokens. Additionally, the function exposes dangerous methods such as .live() which is deprecated and can lead to unexpected behavior.
